ygData.subject: The Fun Has Ariiived!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... RPGs that allow moding make me want to kill something, yesss... Better get used to no moding again, Teltoli. :-) And about the title: no, I m not

Hmm... RPGs that allow moding make me want to kill something, 
yesss... Better get used to no moding again, Teltoli. :-)

And about the title: no, I'm not insane, but getting there.

::Zardus/Starlight/Fenox/Griplash/Recklessa/Repressor/Perndabot/Rex/Kl
uster::

Zardus looks down at his wrist comp, recieving Dark Angel's 
transmission. He frowns, activating his comm.

"Starlight, Fenox, Griplash, Recklessa, Demolition, forget about 
whatever you were looking for." Zardus orders them over the 
comm, "Report to Dark Angel's position, he needs backup against 
Maximal troops."

He then opens his comm to Deemos. "Deemos, some Alliance troops need 
backup at the newly arrived pod. Can you send some of your troops?"

Zardus looks at his wrist comp, noting that Repressor and Najah were 
in the training rooms. Gotron was talking to Lady Hawk, but thatw as 
ok. He could keep an eye on her. But there was always a later time 
for training, battle was urgent.

"Repressor, Najah, report to Dark Angel's position. Attack any 
Maximal troops there," he says into his comm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox and groop recieve Zardus' transmission, turning to head toward 
the battle. They wern't very far away as it is, they could even see 
the battle on their scopes.

Recklessa arrives first, yelling a battle cry as she swoops down 
toward the battle, firing two missiles at Windlord and a few optic 
shots at Aerotaur. Fenox and Starlight arrive behind her. Fenox opens 
fire with an automatic rifle at Angel Prime and Starlight fires 
stinger missiles along with a tranqualizer gun at Teltoli. Griplash 
gets there last, throwing down a charge (set to detonate on impact) 
at Teltoli's pod.

"That femm is Alliance property!" Fenox yells while firing. A shot 
barely misses Fenox's head as Rex flies in, firing.

"No, she's a Maximal," he replies, dodging a shot from Recklessa.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot looks ahead, seeing a battle and recognizing some of the 
energy signatures as Alliance. Finally!

"There's a battle up ahead, let's go!" He says to BrightBlade (Moon 
Mist, I know you're reading this, so you better reply). He takes off 
at a run toward the battle, a missile launcher flipping into his hand.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor sighs as he recieves Zardus' message, his hand jerking away 
when Najah bites him. "We're needed at battle," he says to the bot he 
had been training with as he wriggles out of Najah's grasp, "Let's 
go!"

He runs out of the training room, heading for the exit of the Iron 
Fist.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster looks at Whistler and nods. "Go ahead and help them out."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, steph_teltoli@m... wrote:
> (OOC: Eek, sorry bout the mode, I'm in the middle of another RPG 
and 
> we're allowed to do that, just not fully.. sorry again! Oh, you 
were 
> in the air? Didn't know that..)
> 
> 
> "Mreeooww!" Teltoli yelps in pain when the blade stops, hitting a 
> rib, and leaps off him. It was only a shallow cut. She flaps the 
> wings on her back, preparing to fly up, but Aerotaur succeeds in 
his 
> flying leap, and knocks her to the side.
> 
> She hisses when they both land in the dust, opposite of Windlord, 
and 
> Aerotaur is lying on top of her chest. He quickly rolls off and she 
> jumps up, ready to attack again when she feels two hands grip her 
> shoulders and keep her back. Aerotaur again.
> 
> The Bot sighs and slumps her shoulders, but obeys the unspoken 
order 
> to keep back, she knows she should stay back anyway. 
> 
> "Come on Windlord, kick his tush!" She grins.
